description.value: This Dynatrace plugin can send incident messages to a particular HipChat channel

property.label: URL
property.description: URL of the HipChat channel where the incident message should be sent to. In order to get this URL, one needs to configure a particular HipChat channel to be able to receive external messages. This integration can easily be enabled in the HipChat web UI.

property.label: Enable Notifications
property.description: Allow for HipChat to notify users in chat room of alerts
